Html:
I am doing a project similar to the SixthSense developed by Pranav Mistry.For more info on this project , visit www.pranavmistry.com/projects/sixthsense/

I will be having colored bands arround my fingers.I want a function to check whether a given marker is present in the current frame or not in vb.net.I also want to save the markers when I exit the application.How can I do this in VB.net?
